attributes.action: Stamp Out Ageism and Sexism in Car Insurance Companies
attributes.additional_details: My 17 year old son, who passed his driving test last week, has received a quote of £1,908 for a £500 car.  Changing no details other than his gender, we got his insurance quote down to £1,407.  Changing only his age to 18, and no other details, the quote was reduced by £300.  He is 3 months away from being 18.  Discuss.

rejection.details: This is an issue for the insurance industry.
